data.comment: The match is underway in Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Nagoya throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In the minute 2, Lucas Fernandes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya just outside Sapporo's area.
Lucas Fernandes returns to the field for Sapporo after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 3, Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Sapporo's area.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Mu Kanazaki. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 4, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Goal kick for Nagoya at Sapporo.
In the minute 10, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Sapporo attack but Lucas Fernandes's header doesn't find the target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Nagoya push upfield but Yuichi Nishimura quickly pulls them for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 21, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Nagoya at Sapporo.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In Sapporo Sapporo's Akito Fukumori is caught offside.
In the minute 28, Free kick in a good position for Nagoya!
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya are coming forward and Joao Schmidt gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
In the minute 34, Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Nagoya's Naoki Maeda misses with an attempt on goal.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
Attention is being given to Nagoyaâ€™s Mu Kanazaki and play has been suspended briefly.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Shunta Tanaka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mu Kanazaki is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Sapporo.
In the minute 47, Free kick Sapporo.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 50, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 52, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
In the minute 55, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, The away team replace Gabriel Xavier with Yuki Soma.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Nagoya.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Sapporo make their first substitution with Jay Bothroyd replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Min-Tae (Sapporo) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Sapporo.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Mateus for Nagoya gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Daiki Suga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sapporo.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Sapporo.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Hiroki Miyazawa (Sapporo) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 81, Tomoki Takamine is replacing Takuma Arano for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Ryogo Yamasaki is on a sub for Naoki Maeda for Nagoya.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's third substitution at Sapporo with Douglas replacing Anderson Lopes.
In the minute 87, Sapporo's Douglas breaks free at Sapporo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
At Sapporo the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
An attacking Sapporo player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Takuro Kaneko is replacing Daiki Suga for the home team.
